item.description:
TRANSFORMERS: THE MOVIE

For those of you still in town over the holiday weekend:

OK, if you're between the ages 25-35--even if you missed the first one (in 1986!)--you know you're dying to see this full-length dramatic treatment of The Transformers.

Even though, based on the previews, there seem to be some issues of scale (the Camero that shifts, twists and locks to become....3 stories tall?), Steven Spielberg is executive producer, and the narrator is Optimus Prime!

Forget using your imagination like we all had to do back then...this is your big chance to watch your childhood toys make like Godzilla and wreck havoc on the U.S. while Secretary of Defense Jon Voight does his best to fight back.

WARNING: in the interests of full disclosure, you should know that this movie is 140 minutes long. They paid for all those special effects, and they're going to make sure they use all of 'em, dammit!


Since this is a special advance screening, I recommend buying tickets ahead of time if you're sure you want to go:
http://www.movieticke...

(if link doesn't work, go to movietickets.com or showcasecinemas.com and click through to the July 2 listings for Milford, CT Post 14 Cinema De Lux; we'll be at the 8pm show)

I'll be in the lobby to pick up my tickets by 7:30; I'll email the contact phone number (Michelle) to everyone who RSVPs YES or MAYBE by the morning or afternoon of the event
item.name: More Than Meets The Eye....in CGI
